Title: Total price should reflect the product quantity

Steps.2: Add any item to the Cart

Expected result: Total price should reflect to the quantity of the product

Title: The currency should be changed as expected

Steps.2: Change the currency in the right side menu

Expected result: The currency is changed as expected

Title: The total price should reflect the removing product from the Cart
Precondition: Given user is on the Cart page

Steps.1: There is at least one item in the Cart
Steps.2: Deletes the product from the Cart

Expected result: The Total price should reflect to the changes

Title: User should be able to navigate back to the Cart by clicking the Edit Cart link
Precondition: Given user is on the Checkout page
Expected result: The Cart page should be opened

Title: A list of products in the selected price range is shown

Steps.2: On the right side menu find the Filter by Price section
Steps.3: Select any of the price ranges
Steps.4: Also open any item from the right side Store Menu and select the price ranges on the right side menu

Expected result: A list of products in the selected price range is shown
